## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G03960](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G03960)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CCT8</u>
- **Gene Name:** Chaperonin containing T-complex polypeptide-1 subunit 8
- **Description:**   TCP-1/cpn60 chaperonin family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2095948
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
